debounce-config-apikey: Debounce API Key, if using the paid email validation API
debounce-config-free: If true, uses the free disposable email API. If false, uses the paid email validation API
debounce-config-private: If true and using the free disposable email API, obscure the user's email and only send the domain
debounce-unconfigured: The Debounce extension is not fully configured, please contact the system administrator
